markdownRemark.html: The museum describes the geology and history behind the Rio Tinto company's mining operations in the area. Most of the information is in Spanish, but it is not too difficult to understand, particularly if you have some prior knowledge of geology and mining. Just under an hour's drive from Huelva you can spend an enjoyable day at the Rio Tinto Museum and Pena de Hierro (a disused mine), take a ride on a mining train and walk round one of the old English houses.

frontmatter.title: Museo Rio Tinto
frontmatter.description: Museo Rio Tinto - The museum describes the geology and history behind the Rio Tinto company's mining operations in the area. Most of the information is in Spanish, but it is not too difficult to understand, particularly if you have some prior knowledge of geology and mining. Just under an hour's drive from Huelva you can spend an enjoyable day at the Rio Tinto Museum and Pena de Hierro (a disused mine), take a ride on a mining train and walk round one of the old English houses.
frontmatter.address: Plaza Ernest Lluch, 1, 21660 Minas de Riotinto, Huelva
frontmatter.price: Adults 5.00 euro, children and senior citizens 4.00 euro
